snippet.title: 【De:Lithe Last Memories】Promo Video
snippet.description:
▼ Pre-register now!
https://f1pp.short.gy/ad_gameintro_en
------------------------------------------
Welcome to the official channel of "De:Lithe Last Memories," a next-generation roguelike RPG currently in development!
Here, we'll be sharing the latest game information.
*Please note that the content is still in development and may differ from the final version.
------------------------------------------

◆ What is De:Lithe Last Memories?
Based on the mobile game "De:Lithe The Forgotten True King and the Covenant Angel," which has surpassed 9 million downloads, "De:Lithe Last Memories" is a blockchain game with mobile game quality.

This is the story of girls who throw themselves into battle to rebuild Tokyo.

◆ Synopsis
The story is set in a near-future Tokyo devastated by the "Great Collapse." Players become commanders, train the girls of the "DOLL Unit," and lead them into battle. The mysterious dreams the girls see, the mystery of the gate to another world, and each girl's wish...

Please enjoy the story woven around "the revival of Tokyo and the intertwined feelings of the girls.

◆ Key Features
・36 unique bishojo characters, each with their own music and character scenario
・A world set in the near future of Tokyo 
・A roguelike RPG you can fully immerse yourself in
・Rapidly growing and exhilarating build mode
・Unlimited Strategies with deck composition and skill selection
・Multiplayer mode where players can form parties and explore dungeons together
・PvP and GvG modes where you can challenge others with your trained characters

◆ Characters and Songs
Each 36 bishojo characters fighting to reclaim Tokyo have their own unique songs representing their juvenile feelings. The high-quality music created by a team of talented creators will guide you to the depths of the story.

【5th Unit "Dunamis"】
- Sana Godai (CV: Yurie Igoma) "any pale" (Music: Yusuke Shirato)
- Hikari Kido (CV: Hazuki Ogino) "my glow" (Music: Shuji Kanayama)
- Ayaka Tsugami (CV: Ayana Taketatsu) "Futatsuboshi" (Music:  Ryuichi Takagi)
- Nanami Kenzaki (CV: Maria Abo) "Damper Maiden" (Music: Ash Inoue)
- Mei Hidaka (CV: Akari Kito) "Tenki Yohou under the Sky" (Music:  Atsuhito Sato)
- Rinoa Tendo (CV: Kana Asumi) "Marionette no Shindai" (Music:  Hinako Tsubakiyama)

【6th Unit "Exousia"】
- Miko Ashihara (CV: Shuka Saito) "Aotoao" (Music: Ryuichi Takagi)
- Rion Kaitou (CV: Erina Koga) "Aoi Mama ja Irarenai" (Music:  Fuwari)
- Aoi Kamijo (CV: Ayasa Goto) "Ao no Saku Machi de" (Music: Aira)
- Momoka Asakura (CV: Shiori Tanaka) "Ai no Tsubomi" (Music: Hinako Tsubakiyama)
- Hotaru Akizuki (CV: Ai Kakuma) "Aokokoro wa Secret" (Music:  Sengokunatadecoco)
- Len Ruoxi (CV: Yu Serizawa) "Chinese 4000-year Whatcha" (Music:  Itoi)

【1st Unit "Seraphim"】
- Azumi Hongo (CV: Aina Suzuki) "Grayscale" (Music:  Aira)
- Ritsu Ichimonji (CV: Izumi Yabune) "Moon's Ripple" (Music:  Fuwari)
- Wakana Minami (CV: Ayaka Kamimoto) "Beautiful Morning (Tentative)" (Music: Tomoari Taguma)
- Kotoha Kazami (CV: Maki Yamaichi) "Infinite Corridor" (Music: Hinako Tsubakiyama)
- Komari Yuki (CV: Azumi Waki) "How-to-Watashi!" (Music: Shuji Kanayama)
- Suzuha Kazami (CV: Manaka Iwami) "Mugen Airen" (Music: Hinako Tsubakiyama)

【2nd Unit ""Thrones""】
- Miyako Sonozaki (CV: Rina Hidaka) "Reflected Messiah" (Music: Ash Inoue)
- Natsuha Kisaragi (CV: Shiori Nakasaki) "Blessings, Guide to Tomorrow" (Music: Hinako Tsubakiyama)
- Milia Kazuraba (CV: Ruka Yashiro) "Blue Flame" (Music: sumeshi)
- Hina Hojo (CV: Nao Sasaki) "Milk Heart" (Music:  Hinako Tsubakiyama)
- Aya Hino (CV: Misaki Ohashi) "Fire Light Song" (Music: Fuwari)
- Megumi Tenkuji (CV: Suzuko Mimori) "Sleepless World" (Music: Aira)

【3rd Unit "Cherubim"】
- Luna Tsukuyomi (CV: Yoshino Aoyama) "Gently to the Uncanny" (Music: Aira)
- Fuka Kagawa (CV: Yuuka Takeuchi) "Mirai" (Music: Tomoari Taguma)
- Setsuna Uozu (CV: Ikumi Hasegawa) "Sinking into the Vivid" (Music:  Aira)
- Nagisa Narumi (CV: Haruka Minami) "Love! The Deepest Part!" (Music: Sengokunatadecoco)
- Nana Izumi (CV: Satomi Akesaka) "Smoldering Remnant" (Music: Hinako Tsubakiyama)
- Yuki Banjo (CV: Aina Aiba) "Line no Shindo" (Music:  Fuwari)

【4th Unit "Dominions"】
- Shiki Yaiba (CV: Yuki Harukawa) "Invisible Shine" (Music:  Masaki Honda)
- Otoha Kamiyama (CV: Cocoro Omori) "Resounding Sprechor" (Music: Takahiro Sakita)
- Amano Shiranami (CV: Emi Nitta) "Be The Idol!!" (Music: Shuji Kanayama)
- Mutsumi Sakurai (CV: Ami Mizuno) "Living the Future" (Music: sumeshi)
- Shizuku Fuwa (CV: Mariya Ise) "Follow Suit" (Music: Ash Inoue)
- Tenka Amamiya (CV: Aimi) "1, 2, 3, 4, Personality" (Music: Atsuhito Sato)

▼Links
Official Website: https://lastmemories.io/
X Official Account: https://twitter.com/lastmemoriesen
LINE Official Account: https://lin.ee/fwQWtMm

© GeekOut / enish, Inc.
